models.name: shopping_channels
models.description: Represents the channels through which products are sold in the shopping mall platform. Each channel can have multiple sections and categories, forming the foundation of the platform's organizational structure.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the shopping channel.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A detailed description of the shopping channel.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_sections
models.description: Represents the sections within shopping channels. Each section belongs to a specific channel and can contain multiple categories.

foreignFields.name: shopping_channel_id
foreignFields.description: The channel to which this section belongs. {@link shopping_channels.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the shopping section.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A detailed description of the shopping section.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_channel_categories
models.description: Represents the categories within shopping channel sections. Each category belongs to a specific section and channel, forming the hierarchical structure of the platform's product organization.

foreignFields.name: shopping_channel_id
foreignFields.description: The channel to which this category belongs. {@link shopping_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_section_id
foreignFields.description: The section to which this category belongs. {@link shopping_sections.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the shopping category.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A detailed description of the shopping category.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_customers
models.description: Customer information, but not a person but a **connection** basis. This is the main entity for customer identity management. Contains authentication credentials and basic profile information.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Customer's email address. Used for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Customer's full name.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Customer's phone number.

plainFields.name: address
plainFields.description: Customer's primary address.

models.name: shopping_sellers
models.description: Seller information for marketplace vendors. Contains authentication credentials and business profile information.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Seller's email address. Used for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: business_name
plainFields.description: Seller's business name.

plainFields.name: contact_name
plainFields.description: Primary contact person's name.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Seller's phone number.

plainFields.name: address
plainFields.description: Seller's business address.

plainFields.name: tax_id
plainFields.description: Seller's tax identification number.

models.name: shopping_administrators
models.description: Administrator information for platform management. Contains authentication credentials and admin profile information.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Admin's email address. Used for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Admin's full name.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Admin's phone number.

plainFields.name: role
plainFields.description: Admin's role or permission level.

models.name: shopping_products
models.description: Core product information for the e-commerce platform. Contains all essential details about products including name, description, pricing, and categorization. Serves as the primary entity for product management and is referenced by variants, inventory, and reviews.

foreignFields.name: shopping_category_id
foreignFields.description: Category this product belongs to. {@link shopping_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the product.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the product.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Base price of the product.

plainFields.name: sku
plainFields.description: Stock Keeping Unit - unique identifier for the product.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the product was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the product was last updated.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

models.name: shopping_product_variants
models.description: Product variants representing different options (colors, sizes, materials) for products. Each variant has its own SKU and inventory tracking. References the main product and contains variant-specific details.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_id
foreignFields.description: Main product this variant belongs to. {@link shopping_products.id}.

plainFields.name: sku
plainFields.description: Stock Keeping Unit - unique identifier for this variant.

plainFields.name: option_name
plainFields.description: Name of the variant option (e.g., Color, Size).

plainFields.name: option_value
plainFields.description: Value of the variant option (e.g., Red, Large).

plainFields.name: price_adjustment
plainFields.description: Price adjustment for this variant from base price.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the variant was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the variant was last updated.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

models.name: shopping_categories
models.description: Product categorization hierarchy for organizing products. Categories can have parent-child relationships to create a hierarchical structure. Products are assigned to categories for better organization and filtering.

foreignFields.name: parent_id
foreignFields.description: Parent category if this is a subcategory. {@link shopping_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the category.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description of the category.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code for the category.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

models.name: shopping_inventory
models.description: Inventory tracking for product variants. Monitors stock levels, reservations, and availability status for each product variant. Critical for order fulfillment and stock management.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_variant_id
foreignFields.description: Product variant this inventory tracks. {@link shopping_product_variants.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_id
foreignFields.description: Product this inventory belongs to. {@link shopping_products.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Current available quantity.

plainFields.name: reserved_quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity reserved for pending orders.

plainFields.name: low_stock_threshold
plainFields.description: Threshold for low stock alerts.

plainFields.name: last_stock_update
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last stock update.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was last updated.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

models.name: shopping_product_reviews
models.description: Customer reviews for products. Contains rating, text, and metadata about customer feedback on products. Critical for building trust and providing social proof.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_id
foreignFields.description: Product this review is for. {@link shopping_products.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who left the review. {@link shopping_customers.id}.

plainFields.name: rating
plainFields.description: Rating score (1-5).

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the review.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Main content of the review.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the review was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the review was last updated.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

models.name: shopping_orders
models.description: Main order table containing all order information. Represents customer orders with status tracking and payment information. This is the primary entity for order management.

foreignFields.name: shopping_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who placed the order. {@link shopping_customers.id}.

plainFields.name: order_code
plainFields.description: Unique order code for business identification.

plainFields.name: total_amount
plainFields.description: Total order amount including all items and taxes.

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Currency used for the order (e.g., USD, KRW).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current order status (e.g., pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled).

plainFields.name: payment_method
plainFields.description: Payment method used for the order.

plainFields.name: shipping_method
plainFields.description: Selected shipping method for the order.

plainFields.name: shipping_address
plainFields.description: Shipping address for the order.

plainFields.name: billing_address
plainFields.description: Billing address for the order.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the order was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the order was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the order was soft deleted (if applicable).

models.name: shopping_order_items
models.description: Order line items representing individual products in an order. Each item references a product variant and tracks quantity and price.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order this item belongs to. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_variant_id
foreignFields.description: Product variant being ordered. {@link shopping_product_variants.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Number of units ordered.

plainFields.name: unit_price
plainFields.description: Price per unit at time of order.

plainFields.name: total_price
plainFields.description: Total price for this line item (quantity × unit_price).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the order item was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the order item was last updated.

models.name: shopping_order_status
models.description: Order status tracking table. Records all status changes for an order with timestamps.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order this status belongs to. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Order status at this point in time.

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this status was set.

plainFields.name: changed_by
plainFields.description: User or system that changed the status.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Additional notes about the status change.

models.name: shopping_order_history
models.description: Historical record of all order changes. Captures snapshots of order states for audit trails and change tracking.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order this history record belongs to. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Action performed on the order (e.g., created, updated, cancelled).

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this action occurred.

plainFields.name: changed_by
plainFields.description: User or system that performed the action.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: JSON object containing order state at time of action.

models.name: shopping_shopping_carts
models.description: Represents a customer's shopping cart containing items they intend to purchase. Each cart belongs to a specific customer and can contain multiple cart items. This is a primary business entity that users manage independently through their shopping experience.

foreignFields.name: shopping_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who owns this shopping cart. {@link shopping_customers.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shopping cart was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shopping cart was last updated.

models.name: shopping_cart_items
models.description: Represents individual items in a shopping cart. Each item references a specific product variant and belongs to a specific shopping cart. This is a subsidiary entity managed through the parent shopping cart.

foreignFields.name: shopping_shopping_cart_id
foreignFields.description: Shopping cart that contains this item. {@link shopping_shopping_carts.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_variant_id
foreignFields.description: Product variant referenced by this cart item. {@link shopping_product_variants.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity of this product variant in the cart.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Price of the product variant at the time it was added to the cart.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the cart item was added.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the cart item was last updated.

models.name: shopping_review_moderation
models.description: Tracks moderation actions taken on product reviews. This table records each moderation event, including the administrator who performed the action, the type of action, reason, and timestamp. It supports the review approval workflow and audit trail.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_review_id
foreignFields.description: The review being moderated. {@link shopping_product_reviews.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_administrator_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who performed the moderation action. {@link shopping_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of moderation action (approve, reject, flag).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Reason for the moderation action.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the moderation action was performed.

models.name: shopping_review_ratings
models.description: Stores detailed rating breakdowns for product reviews. This table captures individual rating dimensions (quality, value, etc.) that contribute to the overall rating. It allows for granular analysis of review ratings across different aspects.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_review_id
foreignFields.description: The review this rating belongs to. {@link shopping_product_reviews.id}.

plainFields.name: quality_rating
plainFields.description: Rating for product quality (1-5).

plainFields.name: value_rating
plainFields.description: Rating for product value (1-5).

plainFields.name: service_rating
plainFields.description: Rating for service experience (1-5).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the rating was created.

models.name: shopping_seller_products
models.description: Products managed by sellers, including product details and seller-specific information. This table represents the products that sellers offer on the platform, with a relationship to the main products table.

foreignFields.name: shopping_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the seller who owns this product. {@link shopping_sellers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the main product in the catalog. {@link shopping_products.id}.

plainFields.name: seller_product_code
plainFields.description: Seller-specific product code for internal management.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Seller's price for the product.

plainFields.name: quantity_available
plainFields.description: Current available quantity for this product.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the product (e.g., active, draft, archived).

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller product was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller product was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller product was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_seller_inventory
models.description: Inventory tracking for seller products, including stock levels and management details. This table represents the inventory information that sellers manage for their products.

foreignFields.name: shopping_seller_product_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the seller product. {@link shopping_seller_products.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_variant_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the specific product variant. {@link shopping_product_variants.id}.

plainFields.name: stock_quantity
plainFields.description: Current stock quantity for this inventory item.

plainFields.name: low_stock_threshold
plainFields.description: Threshold for low stock alerts.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the inventory item (e.g., in_stock, low_stock, out_of_stock).

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_seller_orders
models.description: Orders managed by sellers, including order details and seller-specific information. This table represents the orders that sellers need to fulfill and manage.

foreignFields.name: shopping_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the seller who owns this order. {@link shopping_sellers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the main order. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: seller_order_code
plainFields.description: Seller-specific order code for internal management.

plainFields.name: fulfillment_status
plainFields.description: Current fulfillment status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, shipped, delivered).

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business-specific status for workflow management.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller order was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller order was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the seller order was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_admin_actions
models.description: Records of actions performed by administrators. Tracks all administrative activities for audit and accountability purposes. Each action is linked to a specific administrator.

foreignFields.name: shopping_administrator_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who performed the action. {@link shopping_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of action performed (e.g., 'user_management', 'product_approval', 'order_update').

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the action performed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the action was performed.

models.name: shopping_admin_logs
models.description: System logs recording important events and changes. Tracks system-level events that may be initiated by administrators or system processes.

foreignFields.name: shopping_administrator_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator associated with the log entry (if applicable). {@link shopping_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: log_type
plainFields.description: Type of log entry (e.g., 'system_event', 'security_event', 'data_change').

plainFields.name: message
plainFields.description: Detailed log message describing the event.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created.

models.name: shopping_payments
models.description: Payment records for all transactions in the shopping mall platform. This table stores information about each payment made by customers, including payment method, amount, status, and related order information. It serves as the central record for all financial transactions in the system.

foreignFields.name: shopping_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who made the payment. {@link shopping_customers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order associated with this payment. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: payment_method_id
plainFields.description: Payment method used for this transaction. {@link shopping_payment_methods.id}.

plainFields.name: amount
plainFields.description: Total amount paid in this transaction.

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Currency used for the payment (e.g., USD, EUR).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the payment (e.g., pending, completed, failed, refunded).

plainFields.name: transaction_id
plainFields.description: External transaction ID from payment gateway.

plainFields.name: payment_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when the payment was processed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: shopping_payment_methods
models.description: Available payment methods in the shopping mall platform. This table defines all supported payment methods that customers can use to make purchases, including credit cards, digital wallets, bank transfers, etc.

plainFields.name: method_name
plainFields.description: Name of the payment method (e.g., Credit Card, PayPal, Apple Pay).

plainFields.name: method_type
plainFields.description: Type of payment method (e.g., card, digital_wallet, bank_transfer).

plainFields.name: provider
plainFields.description: Payment provider name (e.g., Stripe, PayPal, Visa).

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether this payment method is currently active and available.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: shopping_payment_transactions
models.description: Detailed records of individual payment transactions. This table captures all the detailed information about each payment transaction, including authorization, capture, refund, and chargeback information.

foreignFields.name: shopping_payment_id
foreignFields.description: Payment record this transaction belongs to. {@link shopping_payments.id}.

plainFields.name: transaction_type
plainFields.description: Type of transaction (e.g., authorization, capture, refund, chargeback).

plainFields.name: amount
plainFields.description: Amount involved in this transaction.

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Currency used for this transaction.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of this transaction.

plainFields.name: gateway_response
plainFields.description: Raw response from payment gateway.

plainFields.name: transaction_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when this transaction occurred.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: shopping_shipping_methods
models.description: Shipping methods available for order fulfillment. Contains information about different shipping options, their costs, and delivery time estimates.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the shipping method (e.g., Standard, Express, Overnight).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the shipping method.

plainFields.name: cost
plainFields.description: Base cost of the shipping method.

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery_days
plainFields.description: Estimated number of days for delivery.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shipping method was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shipping method was last updated.

models.name: shopping_shipping_carriers
models.description: Shipping carriers that handle order deliveries. Contains information about different shipping companies and their services.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the shipping carrier (e.g., UPS, FedEx, DHL).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the shipping carrier.

plainFields.name: tracking_url_template
plainFields.description: URL template for tracking shipments with this carrier.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shipping carrier was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shipping carrier was last updated.

models.name: shopping_shipping_tracking
models.description: Tracking information for shipped orders. Contains details about shipment status, tracking numbers, and carrier information.

foreignFields.name: shopping_order_id
foreignFields.description: The order being tracked. {@link shopping_orders.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_shipping_carrier_id
foreignFields.description: The carrier handling the shipment. {@link shopping_shipping_carriers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_shipping_method_id
foreignFields.description: The shipping method used for this shipment. {@link shopping_shipping_methods.id}.

plainFields.name: tracking_number
plainFields.description: Tracking number provided by the carrier.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the shipment (e.g., Processing, Shipped, Delivered).

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery_date
plainFields.description: Estimated delivery date for the shipment.

plainFields.name: actual_delivery_date
plainFields.description: Actual delivery date when the shipment was delivered.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the tracking information was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the tracking information was last updated.
